author: A_Brickset_user
title: Good Set
review: This set is a fun set with a small fast pull back motor.It also is a good re-constructable pieces, when I mixed the pieces with other lego sets I got one cool car!This set is also small enough to put into your pocket.Just don`t crash it into walls.

author: mrmitch
title: Cool little set with pull back motor
review: You would be suprised how quick this little car is. Simple design variety of colors, due to the size of the car it doesn't have a full size mini figure. I have three different little pull back racers and we like to race them and drive the dog nuts chasing it.

author: Ovid07
title: Does This Count As A Mini?
review:
Recently I just fished reviewing all of my Star Wars Minis.  This set is small and looks kinda spacey so I though it might count as another mini.

PROS
Cool little car.
Cool little driver.
Cool little colors.

CONS
None 

OVERALL
Cool little set.

author: Hylocera
title: Vroom Vroom!
review: I got this set at Legoland I think in 2002, and though the set wasn't much for Building Experience or Parts, my brother and I had a ton of fun with the pull-back motor. I remember trying to see who could get it to go further. Although the minifigure wasn't much, he had an awesome flame helmet, and there was that cool printed piece in the front. Three cheers for Tiny Turbos!

author: legodude65
title: fun set
review:
the red bullet set is a fun toy to play with a pull back motor this is the best racer set
of 2002
